title: My ACCOUNT JUST GOT BAN AGAIN?
body: I haven't  pay for few months, today I log in to my account, and it says that is been suspend for everã€‚ I just change my password because of it, can you guys unban the account for me? Thank you @gan Master

replies.body: I took a look into this for you, and it does seem that the account was suspended for a behavioral issue.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to let our PB team know your specific situation, and they can look into it with you directly.
